name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Back-End Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications across healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** utilizing **Lambda**, **Serverless**, **SNS**, and **SQS**. Skilled in implementing **Event-Driven Architecture** and leveraging databases like **MongoDB**. Solid experience with frameworks such as **Next.js** and **React**, as well as CI/CD practices within **Agile** and **Scrum** methodologies.
Strong background in building AI/ML-powered platforms focused on predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing. Expertise in compliance-driven development aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Well-versed in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, complemented by excellent communication skills.
